caption.center: The SMITHFIELD CORPORATION d/b/a The Gallery v. Louis H. PASTORE, Jr. et al.

opinion.attorneys:
Leonard F. Clingham, Jr., Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Faith A. La Salle, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., John Rotondi, Asst. City Sol., Providence, for respondents.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] ORDER [2] The petition for writ of certiorari and petitioner's motion for stay are both denied.
